diagnoses: Drug reaction with eosinophilia and systemic symptoms (DRESS)
Weight loss, easy bruising, and frequent waking are common symptoms of a blood disorder such as leukemia or lymphoma.
Lymphadenitis is a swelling of the lymph nodes, which can be a sign of infection or cancer.
If you are experiencing any of these symptoms, it is important to see a doctor to get a diagnosis and treatment.
